name: Infinity Ninja
description:
Keyboard:
X: Jump
Z: Slash

XBox Controller
A: Jump
X: Slash

---------------------------------------------------

Defeat the evil ninjas in this small game made for the Centro de Cultura Digital's 960x144 Stop Motion game jam.

All the characters were hand drawn and traditionally animated, then photographed and integrated into the game.

Since the animations need to react dynamically to the gameplay, some elements needed to be animated separately. Photographing assets. Checking the animation frames. Making minor adjustments. Sprites ready to be integrated into the game. Some other parts of the process.
